alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 6:29AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Crooked Creek near Norcross affecting Gwinnett and Fulton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Crooked Creek near Norcross. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of the natural flood plain begins mainly on the left bank upstream and downstream from the gauge at Spalding Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:16 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
